Name: The Informant Chronicles- Chronicle 1: Riverside Danger Part 1
About the game: Welcome to the Informant Chronicles! A series of micro RPG games that surround the adventures of mysterious nameless informants as they use special abilities and powers to make the best of their assignments and gather the truths that surround strange circumstances plaguing citizens in all sorts of mysterious worlds. Is this notorious organization behind something bigger? In Chronicle 1: Riverside Danger Part 1, Informant Red is assigned to a ten year old settlement on a river that is fearful in light of a massacre that left over half the village dead on a forest expedition. As she spends more time getting to know the locals, she discovers clues that suggest this incident was no accident. Can you help her uncover the truth?
